2022.7月底这次更新是史上最垃圾的平衡调整，单排人不配玩游戏是吧，按制作组的意思就是匹配进去屠夫必须杀人，一整局下来必须给屠夫一个无敌强大的游戏体验。人类在玩法上本来就是弱势阵营，除了打击手电闪光弹几乎没有反击手段，你这样削打击削自摸，加强屠夫出刀，破坏速度想减少屠夫玩家收尸的概率，然而你再看看环境，守尸屠变少了吗？反而屠夫守的更开心了，逼着单边人转屠？我一个20级0转的初学者军团韩服乱杀人皇，差评，不推荐，这个版本单排单边人不配玩游戏。

I am writing this review on my other account (due to shared library and shit). With roughly 300 hours in the game, I just want to mention that this game used to be so much fun. I main survivor and I loved it. 
Since the new update dropped, I feel nothing but hatred towards this game. I exit the game after one game. Killers are constantly camping and slugging. 9/10 matches, without exaggeration, is a game with a camping killer. This makes the game so frustrating and boring to play.

 ''How can I love a game, when the game doesnt love me back''. 
- Cant remember

I hate to see this game do so bad, so quick. ''Changing the meta'' was the goal of BHVR, but all they managed to do is butcher the perks and buff some, with all the gen regression perks, a single gen can now take up to 3 minutes, that is if, the killer doesnt interfere or kick the generator. 

During the live stream before the 6th aniiversairy, chat was going crazy, we all thought that BHVR finally listened to the community, but no. They managed to fuck the game up. How hard can it be?

I spent a lot of money on this game, and I am truly starting to really regret that. I miss the old dead by daylight. The dead by daylight where killers wouldnt camp as much as they do now. 

all i have to say to the devs, fix your game. Many people are quitting and disliking the game, DO SOMETHING ABOUT IT, PLEASEEEEEE

キラーから始めるも初心者レベルにして実力差が歴然の4人ボイチャパーティサバイバーとの対戦にでくわしてしまい全く歯が立たず、こちらの行動はすべてボイチャで先読みされてて光の速さで発電機も5台修理され(トーテムもしっかり破壊されている)、さっさとゲートあけて逃げて欲しいのに煽りと妨害を受け続け30分近く弄ばれる(サバイバーを担いだ時にライトを重ねられ振り落とされ、かろうじて担げてもひっかけようと思ったフックは仲間が前もって壊している)。耐えかねて途中脱退したいと思ったが脱退するとポイントも貰えず5分間マッチング不可のペナルティを受けるのでひたすら耐え続ける

gaming
As long as players are not tea bagging, it's fun as a newbie player.

This game can be very frustrating if you get tryhard killers/survivors or teammates who do absolutely nothing, however I think once you get past the lowest ranks of the game, things start to get better with finding competent survivors and less toxic killers. Whilst I have only ever mained Feng Min (I just liked her character, and got it before knowing that Fengs are often targeted), I'm already excited for getting her shared perks maxed out then trying to main other characters, as this does become important later on in the game if you want any kind of worthwhile builds. The game is fairly easy to get into, though as I mentioned some lower ranked lobbies may be toxic/tryharding, but you can push through those fairly quickly. Pricing of DLCs is good, especially as there's a discount on right now, but you can also work towards characters by levelling up and getting iridescent shards. Good alone, better with friends and generally a fun game to kill some hours on. 8/10 since the community is pretty toxic.

Really fun game and enjoyable with friends. Wait I should use past tense. Ever since the update the killers do nothing but slug and camp. You are either untouched in this game the whole time or dead dead in the first 2 minutes if that. I understand that we could just get better. But how can one avoid lame killers that dont leave hooks or target one person. I spent money on this game and Im willing to quit at this point. I cry in my bed with my plushy saying "How could dbd be so not fun anymore" "why do all killers have a wedgie". Then i think why did I give my heart to a game that doesnt love me back. Lame. If you dont wanna beat your monitor in half then dont play this game. <3
如果有朋友一起玩 熟练了之后绝对是一款神作 但是上手时间较长 杀手很强 但是操作难度也很高 所以一般遇到的杀手都非常强 四杀是常有的事情 不要刻意追求逃脱得分 救队友修电机才能顺利开大门 还有新手切记带一个毛骨悚然 没有这个逃生者会死的非常快 怕死就带个同族 方便队友救你下钩子

Great Game, 9.5/10, Great with friends, not as good alone but its do able, so much repeatability and the wide cast of characters is great, for both survivors and killers, and the game is very cheap once you have it, since getting a character just themself is 3 pounds, or if you want them for free you can get a special currency what you can only get from leveling up, to get all non-collab characters for free! Love this game (I Have a little over 100 hours when writing this)

This game used to be amazing its still fun but... Crap you may be sorely disappointed if you restart now. Survivors are nerfed to oblivion now. There are tons of terrible players (Like so many more than there used to be) and honestly... The killer is designed to 4 kos EVERY time. There is an addition like sometimes depending on how many gens finished you as the final survivor might have a chance to open the gates... Unless the killer is on the opposite side of the map you are f*ked. You literally cannot open it fast enough to not get hit by the killer, sure you can juke but they will just camp the switch so you go to the other one and he follows you so you finally fake him making him think you went to the previous one and...Honestly the game isn't anywhere near what it used to be its not the same fun. But I still am playing it so there is something wrong with me. If they could just make it balanced I woudn't be b*tching.

Seit letztem Patch machen die Surviver Runden überhaupt keinen Spaß mehr. Man hat nur noch Hardcore Killer, die kein Risiko eingehen müssen von Palletten erwischt zu werden (Huntress, Nemesis, Nurse usw.) und hat keinerlei Handhabe mehr irgendwie gegen diese Killer langfristig anzukommen. Fehler werden seit Wegfall von Hart im Nehmen für Spieler, die das Spiel nicht komplett suchten und jede Mechanik und Karte kennen, sehr hart bestraft. Mit Freunden spielen, die nicht so oft das Spiel spielen ist es nur noch frustrierend, weil man in weniger als 0,5 Spielen von 10 raus kommt und man meistens nicht mal über die 3 Gen Grenze hinauskommt.
Gra kozacka nie mam żadnych uwag bardzo fajne były też ulepszenia postaci i moim zdaniem bardzo rozbudowane były też zadania i Blood web daje 10/10 tej grze.

Now it is completely one sided with how chases are. they increased gen repair time but didnt take into account them buffing the killer's hit on top of how fast they get bloodlust... it use to be fun. Now it is only fun for killer mains. Iron will got a massive nerf so now when injured you are so loud and cant do much about it.

这是一名朴实憨厚为社会主义兢兢业业奋斗的农场主的故事。农场主每天早出晚归，工作踏实可靠，有一天受到了4个狡诈险恶的偷电贼骚扰，为了保护社会主义发电机，农场主拿出了玩具刀、玩具夹、玩具电锯等工具，想要吓走偷电贼。所以看到这里你也明白，游戏一点都不恐怖。
游戏的特色就在于1V4的不对称竞技，这种人数实力上的不平均在游戏内容上得到了弥补。游戏一方是一个有第一人称视角的具有快移速和手持玩具武器·的憨厚农场主，另一方是4个移速一般，但是可以手持开普勒光学聚焦激光高科技的人类
